readme:
**BlogBlitz** is a powerful `n8n` workflow that automates the creation and publishing of SEO-optimized blog posts to WordPress, saving you hours of manual content creation. Triggered on a schedule or via Telegram, it generates high-quality, 1,500â€“2,500-word articles complete with titles, slugs, meta descriptions, images, and more. ## ğŸ¯ Who is this for? * **Bloggers** who want fresh, consistent content. * **Content marketers** aiming for SEO efficiency. * **WordPress site owners** looking to automate blog publishing without sacrificing quality. ## ğŸš¨ Problem Solved Manually creating engaging, SEO-friendly content is time-consuming and requires writing expertise. BlogBlitz solves this by: * Automating ideation, writing, formatting, and publishing. * Generating images and SEO elements. * Keeping your blog active and visible to search engines. ## âš™ï¸ What This Workflow Does Feature | Description ---|--- **Triggers** | \- Runs every 3 hours via **Schedule Trigger**
\- Or on-demand via **Telegram command** : `/generate` **Generates Content** | Uses **OpenRouter** to:
\- Select a category (Technology, AI, etc.)
\- Create a title, slug, focus keyphrase, and meta description **Writes Articles** | **OpenAI** generates 1,500â€“2,500-word articles:
\- SEO-optimized
\- Structured with headings
\- Includes CTA **Adds Visuals** | Generates realistic **featured images** with OpenAI and uploads them to WordPress **SEO Features** | Generates:
\- Optimized slug
\- Focus keyphrase
\- Meta description **Publishes** | Posts directly to **WordPress** :
\- With correct category
\- Featured image
\- Author ID **Notifies** | Sends publish alerts via **Discord webhook** and **Telegram message** ## ğŸš€ Setup Instructions ### âœ… Requirements * Self-hosted or cloud **n8n** instance * Stable internet connection ### ğŸ” Credentials Needed * **WordPress API** (`wp-json/wp/v2`) * **OpenAI API** (text + image generation) * **OpenRouter API** (category & title generation) * **Telegram Bot API** * **Discord Webhook** ### ğŸ”§ WordPress Configuration * Set up post **categories** : * Technology `[ID:3]` * AI `[ID:4]` * Tech Fact `[ID:7]` * Tech History `[ID:8]` * Tech Tips `[ID:9]` * Use **admin user ID** for publishing (default: `1`) ## ğŸ§© Node Setup * **Telegram Trigger** â€” Initiates workflow with `/generate` * **Schedule Trigger** â€” Runs workflow every 3 hours * **Edit Fields Node** â€” Centralizes variable setup (e.g., category IDs) * **OpenRouter Node** â€” Generates topic and meta info * **OpenAI Node** â€” Generates full article and image * **WordPress Node** â€” Publishes post * **Discord Node** â€” Sends publish alert * **HTTP Request Node** â€” Handles image upload or utility calls ## ğŸ› ï¸ Customization Tips Feature | How to Customize ---|--- **Categories** | Update category IDs in the WordPress Post Draft node **Schedule** | Modify the interval in the **Schedule Trigger** **Tone & Style** | Adjust prompts in the **LLM Chain** node **Notifications** | Add Slack, Email, or other channels **Image Style** | Change OpenAI prompt for â€œvividâ€, â€œnaturalâ€, etc. ## ğŸ“¦ Pre-Requirements * **n8n Instance** (Cloud/Self-hosted) * Install: `@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain` * All required API credentials configured * WordPress categories set * Admin user ID available ## ğŸ”§ Nodes Used * `Telegram Trigger` * `Schedule Trigger` * `OpenRouter` * `OpenAI` * `WordPress` * `Discord` * `HTTP Request` ## âœ… Test the Workflow 1. Deploy and connect your n8n instance. 2. Send `/generate` to your Telegram bot. 3. Check your WordPress site for the newly published post!
